    • Uses of Message in bgu.dcr.az.api

      Methods in bgu.dcr.az.api that return Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Message Agent.beforeMessageProcessing(Message msg)
      you can override this method to perform preprocessing before messages arrive to their functions you can change the message or even return completly other one - if you will return null the message is rejected and dumped.
      Message Message.copy() 
      protected Message Agent.createMessage(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object[] args)
      creates a message object from the given parameters and attach some metadata to it..
      Message Agent.getCurrentMessage()
      the agent is an message driven creature - he works only if he received any message - this is the message that the agent currently processing = the last message taken from the mailbox
      protected Message Agent.nextMessage() 
      Methods in bgu.dcr.az.api with parameters of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Message Agent.beforeMessageProcessing(Message msg)
      you can override this method to perform preprocessing before messages arrive to their functions you can change the message or even return completly other one - if you will return null the message is rejected and dumped.
      protected void Agent.beforeMessageSending(Message m)
      override this function in case you want to make some action every time before sending a message this is a great place to write logs, attach timestamps to the message etc.
      void Agent.broadcast(Message msg)
      broadcast a new message - prefer using broadcast(String msg, Object...
      abstract void Hooks.BeforeMessageProcessingHook.hook(Agent a, Message msg)
      callback implementation
      abstract void Hooks.AfterMessageProcessingHook.hook(Agent a, Message msg)
      callback implementation
      abstract void Hooks.BeforeMessageSentHook.hook(int senderId, int recepientId, Message msg)
      callback implementation
      SendMediator Agent.send(Message msg)
      send a new message - prefer using send(String msg, Object...
